functionality.grasping_and_placing: Capable of grasping and placing operations. After grasping an object, the robot will automatically proceed to the trash bin for disposal and return to the original position.

functionality.suction: Capable of absorbing water stains, liquids, and small debris on flat surfaces.

functionality.spraying: Capable of spraying water to loosen and remove small stains. Effective for surface-level cleaning tasks involving liquid and solid residues.
